description: Pops a string from the stack and then treats that as a variable name to read. This allows dynamic reading of variables.
Pops a value from the stack and treats it as a variable name, then pops another value from the stack and assigns it to that variable.
Takes a string from the stack and uses it as a variable name. If the variable exists (has been assigned),1 (true) is pushed to the stack, otherwise 0 (false).
Pops a string from the stack and uses that as the name of a variable, then deletes that variable. Pops a string from the stack and uses that as the name of a variable, then deletes that variable.
